summary: Completed comprehensive testing of RCA Reviewer Google Docs Add-on web app. All backend APIs working perfectly with new OpenAI key. Frontend UI fully functional with all workflows operational including Run RCA Review, executive summary generation, chat functionality, and re-run capabilities.
passed_tests: Backend health endpoint returns 200 OK with proper response
RCA analysis endpoint returns structured response with 6 dimensions (20/30 score), 5 comments, executive summary with 7 sections
Chat endpoint returns proper reply and session_id with AI-generated leadership summary
Process reply endpoint handles comment thread interactions correctly
Empty document validation returns 400 with proper error message
Empty message validation returns 400 with proper error message
Frontend loads with Google-themed design and proper layout
Navigation between Live Preview and Installation Guide tabs
Installation Guide copy button works without crashing (previously fixed)
Document tabs (RCA and RCA Review) switching functionality
RCA textarea contains sample content (1393 characters) and is editable
Sidebar idle state displays correctly with Run Review button and expandable How it works
Run RCA Review button triggers complete workflow: idle → progress (4 steps) → results
Progress steps display correctly with proper transitions and completion indicators
Results display shows score (20/30), top improvements list, and action buttons
Open RCA Review Tab button switches to document review tab and displays executive summary with all 6 sections
Open Global RCA Chat button opens chat interface in sidebar with 3 suggestion buttons
Chat suggestion buttons prefill input field correctly
Chat message sending works with user message display and AI response reception
Chat input Enter key functionality works for message sending
Re-run Review button triggers new analysis cycle and updates all results
Inline comments display correctly below RCA textarea (5 comments with proper formatting)
All UI state management works correctly throughout complete workflows

success_percentage.backend: 100% (6/6 endpoints working - health, analyze-rca, chat, process-reply, validation endpoints)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% (All UI workflows and integrations working correctly)
